title: Old builds that were the META that have fallen out
body: So I was just thinking about how AP Yi used to be SUPER OP, but is now trash because of the lack of AP scaling. I want to find out some old build paths on champs that people used to do. I'd prefer something around season 5-6. I really want to try some old META build paths that people have done, and test them in the current META. If you've got any, please tell me!

replies.body:
Thornmail Ashe used to be meta in the early days of LoL (hence why it was in the old tutorial).

AD Bruiser Eve was also very good in up until her rework. Heck, before the rework, Duskblade was *such* a great buy on her.
